name: Unnamed rogue-like (in development)
description:
I have not freezed this app (only for Linux), you need Python 3 to run it

It is possible to run it on windows / mac by using python. For linux users, I still recommend downloading the source code instead of the executable because it is much, much lighter

Heavily in development, not fun to play

Please help me in Github

Features:

  • Terrain generation
  • Ascii 12x12 tileset
  • Nothing more, really
